author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kotipizza Group March 2018 Sales Up At EUR 10.2 Million
text:
April 6 (Reuters) - KOTIPIZZA GROUP OYJ:
* STORE SALES INCREASED BY 13.6 PERCENT * TOTAL SALES OF RESTAURANTS IN KOTIPIZZA CHAIN GREW BY 19.4 PERCENT IN MARCH 2018 COMPARED TO YEAR BEFORE
* ‍TOTAL SALES OF RESTAURANTS IN KOTIPIZZA CHAIN GREW BY 19.4 PERCENT IN MARCH 2018 COMPARED TO YEAR BEFORE.​
* ‍SAME-STORE SALES INCREASED BY 13.6 PERCENT​
* IN 2018, SALES IN MARCH AMOUNTED TO 10.2 MILLION EUROS COMPARED WITH 8.5 MILLION EUROS IN PREVIOUS YEAR
* ‍MARCH 2018 INCLUDED, CHAIN’S SALES HAVE RISEN FOR 36 CONSECUTIVE MONTHS.​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
